channel.title: Inland Behavior Lab
channel.description: Recent content on Inland Behavior Lab

item.title: About
item.description: Our three core principles 1. Teacher-centered You know your kids. We know the literature. We started the IBL in order to provide tools that respond to actual teacher needs, not anybody else’s. That’s why we give you reproducibles you’re proud to share with your class, editable files for you to customize, data sheets that don’t make you want to cry, and instructions that actual teachers have proofread for clarity. More than anything, we want to give teachers tools that they want to use.

item.title: Gbg
item.description: Good Behavior Game Why would I use this? Because you like the idea of students working together in teams to support one another towards being successful. You have specific time periods during the day when you’d really like to focus in on supporting positive behavior. What’s good about this? It can be done without any materials besides a white-board, it’s flexible towards the behaviors you want to encourage among your students, and it’s got a long history of success.

item.title: Sample_post
item.description: One of the things I’m very interested in is writing words and seeing them on the page.

item.title: Sample Post The Second
item.description: This is the second amazing post that will blow your mind!
